Major update!

Technology:
- automated detection of makeup
- automated detection of earrings + 26 types of earrings you can select

New Mirror release!

- We made it much easier to add multiple friends, switch between their faces, and send both 1-person and 2-person emoji with them. This has been the biggest complaint we heard from our users recently.
- We added search functi

Quick update:
– fixed a number of bugs related to the previous large release
– added >100 new emoji
– made improvements to several face-generation systems

Getting ready for a major release that will make our keyboard much better. Stay t

Huge update to the Mirror keyboard!

– the keyboard suggests personalized Mirror emoji based on what you type, anywhere you type it!
– the keyboard has good word autocorrect and suggest functionality – no need to use any other keyboards for typin

This release fixes a number of bugs connected with the new keyboard in the last release.
We know that the keyboard experience is still far from perfect and will improve it soon.

Also in this release:
- our emoji are now 3D and can turn thei

Let’s celebrate World Cap 2018!

Updates:
– Special stickers for World Cup 2018! Goal!
– Added quick sharing to Instagram Stories. Now you can share your emoji in a few clicks! Yay!
– Added in-app support chat.
– Updated navigation. Tr

We’re happy to release the new personalized GIFs! Enjoy and share with your friends. Happy emojiing!
We’ve completed small UI updates and bug fixes as well.
